speaker: /home/prakharrrr4/wolfy_ui/wolf/media/data/audio_data/daniel_ted.wav
speech: You hear me?  I love this game.  It's not just a part of me; it is me.  And guess what?  There are thousands out there, hungry, waiting for a shot, obsessed with making their mark.
